creator: UniversalAppsStudio
descriptionHtml:
APP FEATURES:

★ Best collection of high quality Goddess Shri Durgaji Amritwani, Aarti & Chalisa.
★ 10 Beautiful collection of Goddess Shri Durgaji high definition wallpapers.
★ Image Switching by default set for 5 seconds.
★ 3 audio tracks Goddess Durgaji Amritwani, Aarti & Chalisa.
★ All audio tracks in high quality form.
★ Lyrics for Aarti & Chalisa in Hindi & English launguage.
★ Showing current & total time of selected Aarti.
★ Set the current audio track as Phone ringtone.
★ Set the current audio track as Alarm tone.
★ Set the current audio track as Contact ringtone.
★ Set the current audio track as Notification tone.
★ Set the current wallpaper on device screen background.
★ Background sounds(Rain sound, Shruti sound).
★ Repeat Mantra for ∞, 1, 11, 21, 51, 108 times from settings button -> music settings.
★ Continuous update on the present count/repetition of Aarti & Chalisa.
★ No gaps between looping.
★ Automatic stop and continue music during phone calls.
★ Smooth transitions & full of animations.
★ You can use bell, conch & aarti lamp.
★ You can use dropping flower effect with five different type of flower (marigold, dahaliya, rose, sunflower & hibiscus) and mix too.
★ You can use touch effect with star & om.
★ Previous / Play / Pause / Next options available for audio.
★ App can be moved to SD Card.

Durga Amritwani Aarti & Chalisa App is the collection of high definition Hindu Goddess Shri Durgaji Ki Amritwani, Aarti, Chalisa and wallpapers. Aarti : Aarti also spelled arti, arati, arathi, aarthi (In Devanagari: आरती ārtī) is a Hindu religious ritual of worship, a part of puja, in which light from wicks soaked in ghee (purified butter) or camphor is offered to one or more deities. Aartis also refer to the songs sung in praise of the deity, when lamps are being offered.

The purpose of performing aarti is the waving of lighted wicks before the deities in a spirit of humility and gratitude, wherein faithful followers become immersed in God's & Goddess's divine form. It symbolises the five elements:
1.space (akash)
2.Wind (vayu)
3.Fire (agni)
4.Water (jal)
5.Earth (prithvi)
(or in this sequence 'Bh'umi (Earth),'A'gni (Fire),'G'agan (Space),'Wa'yu (Wind),'N'eer (Water)).

Recite Shri Durgaji Amritwani, Aarti & Chalisa on the auspicious occasion of Sharad Navratri & Vasant Navratri to invoke divine blessings of Goddess Maa Durga.

Durga Amritwani Aarti & Chalisa App provides most famous Goddess Shri Durgaji Amritwani, Aarti & Chalisa at one place. This app is for all religious people who want to hear all Goddess Shri Durgaji Amritwani, Aarti & Chalisa at a single place with complete devotion.

So download 'Durga Amritwani Aarti & Chalisa' and easily set high definition Goddess Shri Durgaji Ki Amritwani, Aarti, Chalisa and wallpapers as Ringtone, Alarm tone, Contact Ringtone, Notification tone and wallpaper.

Note: Please give us feedback & ratings for support.
Thanks.
descriptionShort: Maa Durga Amritwani, Aarti & Chalisa with Hindi, English Lyrics & hd wallpapers.
